comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Italian migration, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Luigi Luzzatti (note spelling) (1841-1927), Prime Minister of Italy (1910-1911), considered Italy's first Jewish prime minister: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luigi_Luzzatti

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you, pennyrichardsca. Will submit for review to have the spelling of his last name updated to "Luzzatti."
